title: ‘TIME to Go’ Magazine Cover Featuring Donald Trump Not Authentic
subtitle: Fact Check of TIME Cover on Trump: Several social media users shared the cover of TIME Magazine showing a silhouette of  Donald Trump. However, we found that it is not an authentic cover issued by TIME and differs from the official cover.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Several social media users including actor Daniel Newman have shared the cover of TIME Magazine showing a silhouette of US President Donald Trump. The cover is titled as “TIME...to go”.

However, we found that it is not an authentic cover issued by TIME and differs from the official cover, as it does not have any dateline and name of the website.
